CustomField.formula: CASE( cgcloud__Transaction_Type__c , 'Drawback', HYPERLINK("/one/one.app#/sObject/" & cgcloud__Source_Fund__c & "/view", cgcloud__Source_Fund__r.cgcloud__Description__c ), HYPERLINK("/one/one.app#/sObject/" & cgcloud__Target_Fund__c & "/view", cgcloud__Target_Fund__r.cgcloud__Description__c ))
CustomField.label: Fund Description
